thread.title: Details About The Rampage MMA’s War Machine Went On After Finding His Porn Star Ex In Bed With Another Man Are Scary
thread.title_full: Details About The Rampage MMA’s War Machine Went On After Finding His Porn Star Ex In Bed With Another Man Are Scary

author: Matt Keohan
title: Details About The Rampage MMA’s War Machine Went On After Finding His Porn Star Ex In Bed With Another Man Are Scary
text:
Composite

The former MMA fighter known as War Machine is currently on trial facing a whopping 34 counts, including attempted murder, kidnapping and sexual assault.
The allegations stem from his relationship with porn star Christy Mack, which ended violently after War Machine walked in on her in bed with another man in August of 2014. War Machine, whose birth name is Jonathan Koppenhaver, burst into Mack’s home during the early hours of August 8 to find her with her then-boyfriend Corey Thomas. Koppenhaver and Mack were reportedly not officially together at the time but did exchange “I love you” texts roughly an hour before.
Thomas, who is both bigger and taller than Koppenhaver, told the court that in his 12-minute violent encounter, he was bitten and put in a choke hold. When it was all said and done, Thomas suffered a broken nose, dislocated shoulder, scrapes and bruises, and bite marks on his face and arm.
Corey Thomas: This is a photo of myself after the fight in the bathroom. I took the photo myself. I had to clean up & see how bad it is. pic.twitter.com/vrGVDCSV1H 
— Adam Herbets (@AdamHerbets) March 6, 2017 

‘I’m looking up at the ceiling thinking to myself “I’m going to die in Christy’s bathroom. That’s not how I’m going out,” Thomas told the court.
Prosecutors and Corey Thomas are going through more graphic photos of his injuries. #WarMachine pic.twitter.com/WxaRzSlyjC 
— Adam Herbets (@AdamHerbets) March 7, 2017 

The former MMA fighter let the man go with a warning that if he went to the police, Koppenhaver would enlist friends who are Navy SEALs and Hells Angels bikers to hurt him, Thomas said.
After Thomas scampered out of the room, Koppenhaver then turned his rage on Mack, who he’s had a history of abuse with due to jealousy spurred from Mack’s adult film career. Koppenhaver battered Mack to a pulp–leaving her with a broken nose, missing teeth, fractured eye socket, leg injuries and a lacerated liver.
#USA Christy Mack, friend recall vicious attack by War Machine: New disturbing details are emerging about… https://t.co/8zpxv818ZQ #1USNews https://t.co/6f8zLfHoGX 
— USA News (@1USNews) March 7, 2017 

The expert fighter then stood over her and allegedly said: ‘This is it. I’ve got to kill you now.’
Mack said she escaped when she believed her former lover was in the kitchen retrieving a knife to finish her off. She ran naked and bloodied to a neighbors house for help.
Thomas, who was next to Mack in the hospital, claimed her injuries were the “saddest he’s ever seen.”
When I was in hospital, Christy was in the room right next to me. Her eyes looked like they were peppered shut. Teeth gone.’
 
If found guilty, Koppenhaver could serve life in prison without parole.
[h/t Daily Mail ]
